response_parsed.summary: This guide will provide a comprehensive approach to securing and optimizing your edge runtimes by integrating best practices when using FastAPI and Python 3.12+.
key_points: Adopt OWASP Top 10 guidelines for web application security
Implement rate limiting and authentication mechanisms
Use type hints and mypy for type checking
Leverage dependency injection with PyDI or other IoC containers
Adopt Content Security Policy (CSP) for improved security
Configure FastAPI to use HTTP/3 for better performance
Utilize asynchronous programming and multiprocessing for optimal scalability
